forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain, heavy at times. Potential for flooding rains. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: A wind driven heavy rain. Potential for flooding rains. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Potential for flooding rains. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Potential for flooding rains. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Partial clearing late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
